name: Centimetre by Centimetre (Nokia 3310 Jam 4)
description:
Centimetre by Centimetre is an idle game made for Nokia 3310 Jam 4.
Grow your plant, then use it to buy various upgrades to grow your plant even further.
The game saves automatically, whenever you see the save icon in the bottom right.
(You can also save manually on the stats screen)
Time continues even when the game isn't running, so feel free to close the tab and come back later.

Controls

A / Left / Numpad 4 - Navigate left
D / Right / Numpad 6 - Navigate right
W / Up / Numpad 8 - Scroll up
S / Down / Numpad 2 - Scroll down
Space / Numpad 5 - Action / Grow
M - Mute / Unmute Audio
